page.title: 03Daily life in Sparkwell.
page.content:
Saturday May 25th 1985 I got up at 9.30a.m. I had break- fast and washed the dishes. I had a wash and cleaned my teeth and got dressed into my jodhpurs and boots, hat, shirt and jacket. (I was going horse riding.) I was going to Hemerdon and I was going to ride Flicker (the horse). I left home at 10.30 and went to meet my best friend Justyna. We set off for Hemerdon Riding Stables. We got there at 10.55 and paid for the ride. I got on Flicker and Justyna got on Tammy. We went up on the moors and went over some small jumps. We had a good canter and gallop. We came off the moors and down the road and went back. I enjoyed myself very much.
Denise Bevan.
